feed.title: GitHub Dockerfile Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Dockerfile in GitHub

entry.title: merklebot/hackathon-arm-image
entry.summary:
This image contains basic commands to work with camera, microphone and speaker at Spot's computer

Image link

Image link could be acquired in release section of the main repository page

How to use

The container for this image should be runned with flags --device /dev/video0 and --device /dev/snd

Basic example contained in main.py

entry.title: EnterpriseDB/docker-pgbouncer
entry.summary:
Repo for PgBouncer image containers

PgBouncer Container Images by EnterpriseDB

Maintenance scripts to generate Immutable Application Containers for PgBouncer, based on UBI 8 minimal.

These images are customised to work with Cloud Native PostgreSQL operators by EDB for Kubernetes and Red Hat Openshift.
